column1: to the police with one Bothungaarachchi and this suggestion was categorically denied. When PW
2  was  questioned  on  whether  the  incident  of  abuse  was  told  to  Lalith  Bothungaarachchi  she
denied. When it was suggested that the case was fabricated at the said Lalith Bothungaarachchi's
influence this suggestion was also denied by PW 2. She has also categorically stated that there was
no animosity between herself and the accused or wife of accused.
